name: l o n e l y p l a n e t
name_original: l o n e l y p l a n e t
description:
-------------INSTRUCTIONS-----------
you are alone on a very lonely planet.
it's very small. not much to explore.
some things...but...mostly, lonely.

click the mouse where you want the rabbit
to go. right click to talk to people you
meet.

merci, c'est tout.

background music: leyland kirby
